holidays.title: Dimpled Chad Day
holidays.description: Learn all about Dimpled Chad Day by rewinding the clock to the tumultuous 2000 presidential election.

holidays.title: Earth at Perihelion
holidays.description: Get your sunglasses on and bask in all our information about Earth at Perihelion!

holidays.title: Free Flower Basket Day
holidays.description: Go on, give baskets full of beautiful flowers to your adored and beloved ones.

holidays.title: National CanDo Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National CanDo Day by striving to be better and more focused.

holidays.title: National Clara Day
holidays.description: Happy National Clara Day! Clara, your name is in the bright lights on this special day.

holidays.title: National Missouri Day
holidays.description: It’s that time of year when the ‘Show-Me’ state has something to show, will you observe?

holidays.title: National Rachel Day
holidays.description: Learn about the historical origins of Rachel and the name’s popularity over the years.

holidays.title: National Spaghetti Day
holidays.description: A big bowl of noodle-y, saucy goodness is balm for the soul.

holidays.title: Perihelion Day
holidays.description: Gear up for this natural event that brings us closest to the sun.

holidays.title: Pop Music Chart Day
holidays.description: Go ahead and crank up the volume 'cause it's time to groove to some pop.

holidays.title: Tom Thumb Day
holidays.description: General Tom Thumb — a dwarf actor — took the entertainment industry by storm!

holidays.title: Weigh-In Day
holidays.description: Weigh into the latest fitness and diet routines to recover from the holiday eating period.

holidays.title: World Braille Day
holidays.description: Let’s spread awareness about Braille and all other forms of communication that are accessible!

holidays.title: World Hypnotism Day
holidays.description: On the count of three, you’ll be fully ready to celebrate this day with us.

holidays.title: Dafne Keen’s Birthday
holidays.description: The opportunities are unlimited for Dafne Keen, a young, brilliant rising star.

holidays.title: Isaac Newton’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is arguably the greatest scientist of his generation and his works have shaped modern physics.

holidays.title: Jeannie Mai’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Emmy Award-winning host is taking over the entertainment and fashion industry.

holidays.title: Kris Bryant’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kris Bryant has shown himself to be worthy of all emulations in baseball.

holidays.title: Martell Holt’s Birthday
holidays.description: His success story is a testament to his hard work, determination, and consistency.
